1. Unpack release with winrar (rightclick and choose extract here)
2. Mount image with Daemon Tools Lite
http://www.daemon-tools.cc/eng/downloads
3. Install
4. Copy the content from the SKIDROW folder on the DVD to your
installation directory and overwrite
5. Play the game

Game crash all the time....

Does anyone know how I can deal with the "The application has failed to start because the application configuration is incorrect" message when I press the exe? My system is XP SP3 with updated graphic drivers.

Heres some fixes to problems I had:

If you are getting  "The application has failed to start because the application configuration is incorrect"

You need to make sure you have all the Visual C++ 2005/2008 redistributables from Microsoft installed. Then you need to place "
Microsoft.VC80.CRT.manifest" and "msvcr80.dll" in the same folder as your Elemental.exe. I cannot 100% say that you need .Net Framework 3.5, but its also possible (its something I tried). With the combination of all these things the error should stop.

If your game never starts after you pick your hero or try to start the campaign and you either get a black screen (campaign) or an infinite animated screen (sandbox):

You need to apply ALL of the Skidrow patches. 1.01, 1.05 and the 1.05 /w hotfix patch. You do not have to copy the cracked content over everytime but you MUST install ALL of these patches in order. Also make sure they are going to your Elemental folder because the installer defaults to something else. If you changed your install folder, then double check.

Random crashes and other game problems are NOT Skidrow's fault ATM. The game needs many more patches. I honestly do buy games if I like them, but can't say I'd buy this one until its patched to a reasonable state of enjoyment. Its still very beta.

There is nothing wrong with the torrent itself but this game is absolute shit. I have the game fully patched, (and i've read posts saying its both better when and when not patched, which is correct?!) the game crashes as often as people are raped in RL.

The CEO of stardock is apologizing for even releasing the game. Maybe it because every time you try to load while already in a game, it crashes, or there's a certain turn threshold (somewhere after 300) where it ALWAYS crashes. And my PC completelyowns the requirements. The game is unplayable, and i feel dirty for even having downloaded it.
Oh yah, alt-tabbing the game is also just a gamble of crash. I could have gone and totaled my car and had more fun in the time it took to try and get the game to work for more than 7-10 minutes.

The Corrupt Patch message is easy to fix, set your clock to before September 1st, and its gone, no need to worry about internet connection/etc.

Perhaps if a game company made the promise of trees that grow actual money, I'd be enough of a sucker to try it out.
I want a several Number All works but i need a code!!!!

I am getting "This application has failed to start because the application configuration is incorrect. Reinstalling the application may fix the problem." every time I try to run Elemental.exe. I have the C++ redistributables. I also have some .NET framework, but not sure of the version.

I fixed my problem by copying the files "Microsoft.VC80.CRT.manifest" and "msvcr80.dll" in the same folder where Elemental.exe is. So even though I do have the C++ redist installed, I still had to find these files on my drive, and copy them also to the "C:\Program Files\Stardock Entertainment\Elemental War of Magic" directory.   Thanks to elementalbeast for the good tip!

Initially tried installing this and then the 1.11 patch before running it for the first time.

FOREVER SPLASH SCREEN.

Following suggested method of installing patches 1.01, 1.05, 1.05 with hotfix. Then I'll continue on with 1.09, 1.10, and 1.11, renaming/deleting datafix.exe from the main game folder if it hangs there again.

Will repost on failure/success.

Okay, updating worked by installing each patch in order: 1.01, 1.05, 1.05 hotfix. 1.06 stuck me on the splash screen again, so I rebooted and deleted DataZip.exe from the main game folder. Worked perfectly. Continued on starting from 1.09 and every patch worked up to 1.11, but I had to delete DataZip.exe each time.

1.09+ say they have all the previous content, so you should be able to install the game and then just patch 1.11 (deleting DataZip.exe), and it should work fine. I just wanted to document the updating process. :)

Okay, updating worked by installing each patch in order: 1.01, 1.05, 1.05 hotfix. 1.06 stuck me on the splash screen again, so I rebooted and deleted DataZip.exe from the main game folder. Worked perfectly. Continued on starting from 1.09 and every patch worked up to 1.11, but I had to delete DataZip.exe each time.

1.09+ say they have all the previous content, so you should be able to install the game and then just patch 1.11 (deleting DataZip.exe), and it should work fine without the other patches. Have fun. :)
